upgrade.itemupgrader.obsidian_shield.des: Protects the Wielder from Flames temporarily.
upgrade.itemupgrader.turtle_helmet.descr: Wield the Power of the Turtle!
upgrade.itemupgrader.dolphins_gift.descr: Grants the gift of movement to those who swim like the dolphin.
You must surface every 4 seconds to maintain your speed.
upgrade.itemupgrader.nimble_landing.desc: Fall damage becomes hunger damage, make sure you carry food!
Doesn't work when below 3 whole hunger bars.
upgrade.itemupgrader.dual_wield.descript: Attack significantly faster, but at what cost?
upgrade.itemupgrader.void_totem.descript: Saves you from dying in the void, but only once.
tooltip.itemupgrader.void_totem.effect: When taking void damage, gain Levitation and Feather Falling temporarily
upgrade.itemupgrader.recall_totem.descri: Teleports you to your spawnpoint when triggered.
upgrade.itemupgrader.wormhole_totem.desc: Allows you to save and load one location.
Can be reset with sneak+left click
upgrade.itemupgrader.creeper_totem.descr: When triggered, a large explosion occurs.
upgrade.itemupgrader.dragon_totem.descri: Channel the fury of the dragon!
Gain a temporary boost in strength to fight back!
upgrade.itemupgrader.wither_totem.descri: At death's door, death itself grants you a final stand!
Gain the wither's shield for a short time to resist death further.
upgrade.itemupgrader.fortunate.descripti: Grants your tool the blessing of the mine.
